contributionDescription:
I am a loyal user of OP. I have done quite a few transactions on the chain.
I have also shared the benefits and outstanding points of OP with other users.
I am also a member of the Xai project. Hopefully, Xai will also develop on the OP chain in the near future
impactDescription:
Many people have realized the superiority of OP chain from what I said.
In the near future, I will discuss with the team, the creators will develop more applications and projects built on the OP chain.
Currently, many members are using OP chain to gradually replace other chains with higher fees and slower
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because the applicant promises of future deliverables which is in violation of rule 1 of the grant program rules.
pwCategorySuggestions: End-User Experience, Community Building, Tokenization Platforms
